Plot: After a neighborhood tragedy, two adolescent brothers confront changing relationships, the mystery of nature, and their own mortality.
Title: Hide Your Smiling Faces
Actors: Ryan Jones, Nathan Varnson, Colm O'Leary, Thomas Cruz
tomatoConsensus: Its meditative pace and low-key approach may prove too ponderous for some, but Hide Your Smiling Faces will cast a potent spell on viewers patient enough to let it unfold.
